title: Prime-Line D 1762 1-1/4 In. Steel Ball Bearing Sliding Door Roller Assembly, for Nu-Air Doors (Single Pack)
features: Used by Nu-Air and a variety of other sliding patio door manufacturers
Threaded mounting hole on back end
Steel housing and ball bearing roller
description: This is a plain back patio door roller assembly with a 1-1/4 inch concave steel ball bearing roller. It has a plain back housing that is 3/4 inch wide with a 7/8 inch flare and 1-3/16 inch tall. It is rear adjusting with a threaded mounting hole on the back end. It is used by Nu-Air and a variety of other sliding patio door manufacturers.
This sliding glass door roller is constructed from steel. It comes affixed to a steel housing with a thickness of 7/8 in. This style roller is used on Nu-Air and similar styled glass doors.
